text: #Coronavirus: first death outside China recorded in Philippines as total fatalities pass 300 https://t.co/O2ugb996ZZ

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Philippines reports first coronavirus death outside China
entity.description: According to local health officials, a 44-year-old male, who was confirmed as the second person with the 2019 novel coronavirus in the Philippines, passed away on February 1.
